messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 959
messages.msgSnippet: I wish you weren t leaving NJ Ann!  I have also had the same problem and am still looking for a group, although I think that we will end up being loners in the
messages.messageBody:
I wish you weren't leaving NJ Ann! I have also had the same problem and am
still looking for a group, although I think that we will end up being loners
in the end.

Bonnie in Trenton

It's really unfortunate, isn't it! There must be so many people keeping to themselves because they aren't interested/or are overwhelmed in the "only show in town". If I had the time and energy, I'd start something myself...oh well... the more leaving becomes real, the more sad I am - I've been here my whole life. This will be a big change! Ann
